name: Monster Slayer (itch) (njcn)
description:
Slash your enemies! DISCLAMER: This game is hard by default! This game is for you pro gamers only! (Don't worry there will be difficulty options in future release) Player Controls:
  • W, A, S, D - Move Character
  • Enter or Left Click - Attack
Credits:
  • Game Made Using: Unity
  • Created By: NJCN
  • Assets by: Game Endeavor
  • Sound Effects by: Mojang Studios
  • Sound BGM by: M. J. Hood Music
